name: kontoj
description: Kontoj is a self hosted accounting and finance management system focused on double entry bookkeeping. It allows recording transactions, accounts and various reports to support small business or personal finance workflows.
features: Double-Entry Bookkeeping: Accurate accounting with double-entry transaction recording. Professional financial records.
Account Management: Chart of accounts with customizable account types and categories. Organize finances logically.
Transaction Recording: Record income, expenses, and transfers with detailed entries. Track all financial activity.
Financial Reports: Generate balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow reports. Understand financial position.
Invoice Management: Create and track invoices for clients and customers. Manage accounts receivable.
Expense Tracking: Record and categorize business expenses with receipts. Monitor spending patterns.
Client Management: Maintain client database with contact and billing information. Organize customer relationships.
Multi-Currency: Support for multiple currencies with exchange rate tracking. Handle international transactions.
Bank Reconciliation: Match transactions with bank statements for accuracy. Ensure books are correct.
Tax Reporting: Generate tax reports and summaries for filing. Simplify tax preparation.
Audit Trail: Complete history of all transactions and changes. Maintain accountability.
Export Data: Export financial data to CSV, PDF, and other formats. Share with accountants or stakeholders.
